question: What micro-RNAs are useful in the diagnosis and prognosis of Heart Failure?
ideal_answer: In particular, miR-214, miR-423-5p, appear to be promising for the diagnosis, prognosis and management of HF patients.

snippets.text: n this review, we discuss the role of miR-214 in various cardiac disease conditions, including ischaemic heart diseases, cardiac hypertrophy, pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH), angiogenesis following vascular injury and heart failure.
Likewise, serum levels of c-miRNAs such as miR-423-5p have been evaluated as potential biomarkers in the diagnosis and prognosis of heart failure
